data.title: Basement Waterproofing, Finishing, Foundation Repair in Milwaukee, Madison, WI
data.meta_description: Wisconsin and Illinois Basement Waterproofing: we offer expert wet basement waterproofing repair, foundation repair and crawl space repair in Janesville, Rockford, Madison, Milwaukee and La Crosse, West Allis, Racine, Waukesha, Eau Claire. Free Estimates.
data.text:
Patented crawl space & basement waterproofing system

Does your home have issues with basement flooding, leaky egress windows, rotting crawl space joists, excess humidity, or other moisture-related problems? If left unrepaired, a wet basement or crawl space can lead to widespread issues throughout the home, including mold, costly water damage, and unhealthy indoor air. So stop worrying about moisture problems in the below-grade space and contact Badger Basement Systems for our award-winning basement and crawl space waterproofing system.

Our crawl space and basement waterproofing solutions will ensure a drier below-grade space, creating a more comfortable, valuable, and healthier home overall. Whether you need basement waterproofing, crawl space encapsulation, or a new sump pump system, we provide these solutions and more. Schedule a free basement waterproofing or crawl space encapsulation estimate today! We proudly serve Wisconsin & Illinois areas throughout Milwaukee, Racine, Kenosha, and nearby.

Permanent foundation repair solutions in Milwaukee & nearby

If your home has bowing walls, foundation cracks, a leaning chimney, or other signs of structural damage, then contact the experts at Badger Basement Systems. From foundation settlement to collapsing retaining walls and sagging floor joists, we can handle any problem - no matter how big or small. Our foundation repair solutions can be customized to suit your structural needs, providing permanent results that stabilize the foundation and boost property value.

Schedule a free foundation repair estimate to find the permanent solutions to your home's structural problems. We proudly serve Wisconsin & Illinois areas throughout Southern WI & Northern IL.

Simple, durable concrete leveling & lifting services

Does your home have sinking interior floors, a damaged driveway, or a settling patio? Sinking concrete can be an eyesore, lowering your home's curb appeal and value. That is why Badger Basement Systems provides a fast-acting, long-lasting concrete lifting and leveling solution with PolyLevelÂ®. Other companies offer outdated and disruptive concrete repair methods, such as mudjacking. These services fail to address the underlying cause of sinking slabs, so you'll have to pay more to have the work done again. But with PolyLevel, you won't have to worry. This lightweight, incredibly durable concrete leveling solution provides accurate, water-resistant results you can rely on for years to come.

How PolyLevel concrete leveling works:

First, we inject a two-part polyurethane foam beneath the sinking slab through Small 5/8 inch holes and ports.

After, it quickly expands to fill every gap, providing an incredibly durable and accurate lift.

Finally, the concrete cures in 15 minutes and creates lasting, waterproof results! Mudjacking or slabjacking can take up to 24 hours and is not resistant to moisture.

Schedule a free concrete leveling estimate to learn more. We offer concrete lifting services throughout Wisconsin & Illinois in Kenosha, Madison, Rockford, IL, and nearby.
